name: Sergio Perez
description:
Edition Race Suit - Mexican GP, 2021 No. 34504
DESCRIPTION
A driver’s race suit creates the ultimate driver’s environment for peak performance, fatigue reduction, stabilized body temperature, and sustained endurance. Its primary function is comfort and safety, and if it also looks kick-ass, that’s a bonus! For Checo’s first home Grand Prix as a Red Bull Racing driver, we’ve designed a special race suit to commemorate the weekend with a special edition pattern, unique to the 2021 Mexican GP. Our Collectible shows this memorable design in fine detail and serves as a great memento for Checo’s fans.
